text: Greetings braintrust :slightly_smiling_face: What are best practices for managing short snippets of content, those that don’t warrant their own pages (like a blog post). We’re putting together an FAQ module and trying to decide between a HubDB approach, just building the fields as a repeater in the module itself, or even service hub. Whatcha think? Some FAQ’s will be super short and sweet, some longer form.

really depends mostly on the editing experience.

If it truly is an FAQ and you’re not likely to have say more than  20 questions then the module approach may be the better editing experience.

Service Hub makes sense if it’s not just going to be FAQs but more in-depth with more than say 20+ questions and answers.
